doc:
Eric Portman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Portman 0 Eric Harold Portman (13 July 1901 – 7 December 1969) was an English stage and film actor. He is probably best remembered for his roles in several films for Michael Powell and Emeric Pressburger during the 1940s. Eric_Harold_Portman ( 13_July_1901 – 7_December_1969 ) was an_English_stage_and_film_actor . He is_probably_best_remembered for his_roles in several_films for Michael_Powell and Emeric_Pressburger during the_1940s .
